Cekcok di Rumah Kepala Dusun di Jeneponto, Ayah-Anak Dikeroyok Massa
04 Nov 2019, 21:47 by Muhammad Nur Abdurrahman
Makassar - Dua orang warga Desa Baraya, Jeneponto, Sulsel, dikeroyok warga dari Kampung Batu-batua. Satu orang tewas, seorang lainnya luka berat.
"Saat ini kami masih mengumpulkan bukti-bukti dan keterangan saksi, terkait kasus penganiayaan ini, motif pengeroyokan masih didalami, para pelakunya juga masih kita cari," ujar Kapolres Jeneponto AKBP Ferdiansyah saat dimintai konfirmasi, Senin (4/11/2019).
Korban tewas bernama Ambo (30) dan korban luka bernama Mantari Dg Nuntung (60). Anak dan ayah ini dikeroyok warga Kampung Batu-batua karena cekcok dengan salah satu warga Batu-batua.
Pengeroyokan menurut polisi terjadi di rumah kepala dusun Batu-batua saat memediasi kasus cekcok. Dari informasi yang dihimpun, pengeroyokan ini bermula dari ketersinggungan massa dengan kehadiran dua orang korban di rumah kepala dusun Batu-batua
Untuk mengantisipasi serangan balasan dari korban pengeroyokan, Polres Jeneponto memperketat pengamanan di sekitar lokasi kejadian.
Selain itu, anggota Polres Jeneponto juga meyakinkan keluarga korban pengeroyokan soal penanganan hukum kejadian ini.

(mna/fdn)

Bickering at the Hamlet Head's House in Jeneponto, Father and Son Crowded
Nov 04 2019, 21:47 by Muhammad Nur Abdurrahman
Makassar - Two residents of Baraya Village, Jeneponto, South Sulawesi, were beaten by residents from Kampung Batu-batua. One person was killed, another seriously injured.
"At the moment we are still gathering evidence and witness statements, related to this persecution case, the motive for the beatings is still being explored, we are still looking for the perpetrators," said Jeneponto Police Chief Adjunct Senior Commissioner Ferdiansyah when asked for confirmation, Monday (11/04/2019).
The death toll was named Ambo (30) and the wounded was named Mantari Dg Nuntung (60). This child and father were beaten by residents of Kampung Batu-batua because of a bickering with one of the residents of Batu-batua.
The beatings, according to the police, took place at the Batu-batua hamlet head's house while mediating a bickering case. From the information gathered, the beating began with a mass offense with the presence of two victims in the house of the Batu-batua village chief.
To anticipate a retaliatory attack from victims of beatings, Jeneponto Regional Police tightened security around the scene.
In addition, Jeneponto Police officers also convinced the families of the victims of the beating about the legal handling of this incident.
